forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Mostly cloudy. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 40 in the afternoon. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8pm, then a chance of snow between 8pm and midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 27. Northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs has plenty of coverage , depth , and groom on the upper loops. The sweet spot between hard and soft was 10:30 to 1:00. A little bit of wind debris , but not an issue . LF 8 rilled

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 6 Lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are in late season. Expect bare spots, especially on the lower trails.
nubsNob.comments: What a difference a day makes. This morning it is raining at Nub's but that is forecast to change to snow soon with some accumulation expected. The groomers are out in full force this morning. As the snow begins to freeze expect variable conditions on the slopes. Today is TELEbration sponsored by our friends at The Outfitter of Harbor Springs. This is a great chance to try a pair of demo telemark skis and hang out with your free-heel friends at the warming hut at the bottom of Birch Run. NASTAR Racing today from 12:30 to 2:30 PM. Pintail Peak lodge is open with a deli and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
